1.caption_en:
The slide titled "Functional Ecosystem Integration" summarizes three lenses—Product, Brand, and Business—to evaluate how ecosystem integration helps customers, increases brand value, and affects the business model.

{
  "artifact_type": "presentation_slide",
  "title": "Functional Ecosystem Integration",
  "language": "English",
  "summary": "Outlines three lenses to evaluate ecosystem integration: Product, Brand, and Business, each posed as a question about customer benefit, brand value, and business model impact.",
  "bullets": [
    {
      "index": 1,
      "label": "Product Lense",
      "text": "How does it help the customer?",
      "ocr_notes": "'Lense' is likely a misspelling of 'Lens'."
    },
    {
      "index": 2,
      "label": "Brand Lense",
      "text": "How does it increase brand value?",
      "ocr_notes": "'Lense' misspelling; OCR shows 'doés' with an accented e."
    },
    {
      "index": 3,
      "label": "Business Lense",
      "text": "How does it affect your business model?",
      "ocr_notes": "OCRed region shows this item numbered '4.' instead of '3.'; 'Lense' misspelling."
    }
  ],
  "visual_cues": "Large dark title at top with teal underline, light gray background, centered left-aligned body text in large sans-serif font.",
  "ocr_text": "Functional Ecosystem Integration\n\nTo succeed with Ecosystem Integration requires you to reimagine your companies activities through three specific lenses:\n\n1. Product Lense -> How does it help the customer?\n2. Brand Lense -> How doés it increase brand value?\n\n4. Business Lense -> How does it affect your business model?",

    "Numbering error: third item is labeled '4.' in the OCRed region."
  ]
}
